eu.cqse.check.cpp.misra.arrays

Class ArrayContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.cpp.misra.arrays.ArrayContext

  • public class ArrayContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the array and holds the tokens representing its initialization.
